translations: 含硫磺的，含硫的，含硫酸的

sentences.sentence: These are immersed in an electrolyte of dilute sulphuric acid.
sentences.translation: 他们浸在一种稀释硫酸制成的电解质中。

sentences.sentence: They are composed largely of (80% concentration) sulphuric acid.
sentences.translation: 这些组织主要(80%浓度)硫酸。

sentences.sentence: In 2005 world production of sulphuric acid was estimated at 193 million tonnes.
sentences.translation: 据估计，2005年全球硫酸产量达到一亿九千三百万吨。
